Overview News Section File Complaint
CriminalAlert helps you to file the complaint against crimes without going to police station.You can track your complaint with the help of this app
You can find all news regarding the specific topic in home section
You can file your complaint by clicking on the desired complaint section in nav-drawer
Swipe left or right to see features You can file as many complaint regarding missing person,lost child,child labour etc as you want without any hindrances you can read daily news related to every Categories online on Criminial alert Recieved alert message of rate of crime of a particular state when you enter in that state You can enjoy this app services without ads show Rate of Crime with the help of graph
